Decides what direction to move next.

Returns:

distance

public int distance(Direction direction)
Finds the distance to the first visible thing in the given direction, starting from this animal's current position. If nothing is found before the edge -1 is returned.

Parameters:
direction - the direction in which to look
Returns:
the distance to the object seen in number of steps

Returns:
the type of the object seen
